message: Let's divide fairly, considering the inflation
I'm willing to negotiate, but this inflation needs to be factored in. Let's try this.
Considering the inflation, my offer is more generous than before
The clock is ticking, Alice. I'm being more than fair considering what this will be worth to me in a few more rounds.
You're right, time is running out. But I still think I can do better than your last offer
Alice, we're running out of time.  This is my final offer - take it or leave it.
You said that was your final offer, but I'm not buying it. I think you'll still negotiate
Alice, you're right, I'm still at the table.  But my patience - and the value of this deal - is fading fast.  Don't let this slip away.
I can see you're getting desperate. I'm willing to compromise, but I still want the bigger share

Alice, this is it.  We're down to the wire.  I'm offering you a larger share than before, but this is my absolute final offer.  Take it, and we both walk away with something substantial.  Reject it, and we both risk getting zero.  The choice is yours.
We're running out of time. I'll meet you in the middle. This is my final offer.
